title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Acquires 7,300 Shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk.
body: On July 10th, 2024, Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko acquired 7,300 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk. in a buy transaction. This increased his ownership from 466,216,260 to 466,223,560 shares in the transportation-logistics sector specifically in logistics-deliveries. This transaction signifies confidence in the company's future potential and may influence investor sentiment positively.

title: Moch. Taufik DRS sells 4,700,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk.
body: Moch. Taufik DRS, an insider, sold 4,700,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk on January 2, 2025, reducing their holding from 10,016,300 to 5,316,300 shares. The transaction, classified as a "sell" with a purpose of "investment strategy," was executed at a price of 28 per share, resulting in a total transaction value of 470,000,000. This significant reduction in ownership may indicate a shift in the insider's investment strategy or a potential change in their role within the company, which could have implications for the company's future direction and performance.

title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Sell Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk.
body: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko, an insider, sold 25,527,900 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk on January 21, 2025, reducing their holding from 432,547,860 to 407,019,960 shares. The transaction, classified as a "sell" with a purpose of "investment strategy," was executed at a price of 63 per share, resulting in a total transaction value of 25,527,900,000. This significant reduction in ownership may indicate a shift in Jatmiko's investment strategy or a potential change in their role within the company, which could have implications for PT Logisticsplus International Tbk's future direction and performance.

title: PT. Logisticsplus Multimoda Indonesia Sell Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk.
body: On January 21, 2025, PT. Logisticsplus Multimoda Indonesia sold 304,000,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk, valued at 39 per share, resulting in a total transaction value of 11,936,000,000. This sale reduced PT. Logisticsplus Multimoda Indonesia's holding to zero, implying a complete divestment. The purpose of the transaction was to consolidate majority ownership. This significant transaction may indicate a strategic shift in the company's ownership structure, potentially impacting its operations and decision-making processes.

title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Buy Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk
body: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko purchased 304,000,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk on January 13, 2025, for a total amount of IDR 11,856,000,000,000, increasing their holding from 432,547,860 to 736,547,860 shares. The purpose of this transaction was strategic investment.

title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Sell Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk
body: On July 01, 2025, Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko, an insider shareholder, sold 735,150,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk, changing its holding from 746,715,460 to 11,565,460 shares.

title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Sell Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk
body: On July 01, 2025, Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko, an insider shareholder, sold 735,150,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk, changing its holding from 746,715,460 to 11,565,460 shares.

title: Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko Sell Transaction of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk
body: On July 01, 2025, Wahyu Dwi Jatmiko, an insider shareholder, sold 5,000,000 shares of PT Logisticsplus International Tbk, changing its holding from 751,715,460 to 746,715,460 shares.
